content.en: Visibility forecasting: Scientists have been exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to improve visibility forecasting and predict low visibility events in various locations around the world. These algorithms, such as supervised machine-learning regression techniques, decision tree algorithms, boosting-based fusion models, and neural network approaches, are being used to analyze weather data and make accurate predictions. The goal is to provide early warnings of low visibility conditions, particularly for aviation services, and improve visibility forecasts in different topographical regions.
content.da: Synoptisk forudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af machine learning-algoritmer til at forbedre synoptiske forudsigelser og forudsige lav synlighedsbegivenheder på forskellige steder rundt omkring i verden. Disse algoritmer, såsom overvågede machine-learning-regressionsteknikker, beslutningstræsalgoritmer, boost-baserede fusionsmodeller og neurale netværkstilgange, bruges til at analysere vejroplysninger og foretage præcise forudsigelser. Målet er at give tidlige advarsler om lav synlighedstilstande, især for luftfartstjenester, og forbedre synlighedsforudsigelser i forskellige topografiske regioner.
